mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the Paramacronychiinae of China (Diptera: Sarcophagidae)

tax:ref_group.tax:p: AnimaliaInsectaDipteraSarcophagidaeWohlfahrtiafedtschenkoispeciesRohdendorf, 1956: 222Wohlfahrtia fedtschenkoiRohdendorf, 1956: 222.Type locality:Turkmenistan, Djebel. tax:div.tax:p: ChinaXinjiangKalamaili20140526M. ZhangChinese specimens examined. CHINA : Xinjiang : 2 males , Altay , Kalamaili , 26.V.2014 , M. Zhang;ChinaAltayKalamaili20150523M. Zhang & C. Wang43 males , 22 females , Altay , Kalamaili , 21.VI–23.V.2015 , M. Zhang & C. Wang (all MBFU ).

Distribution.CHINA:Gansu (Lanzhou, Shandan),Hebei (Zhangjiakou),Neimenggu (Alxa, Bayannur, Wuhai),Ningxia (Yinchuan, Helanshan, Tongxin, Zhongwei),Shanxi (Lishi),Xinjiang (Altay, Suiding [= Huocheng], Minfeng, Ruqiang, Usu); Palaearctic Region.
